downloadTitle: Update for Windows XP x64 Edition (KB2863058)
downloadDescription: Install this update to resolve issues in Windows.
detailsSection: Install this update to resolve issues in Windows. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article for more information. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
systemRequirementsSection_supportedOS: Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 x64 Edition
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click the Download button and then do one of the following, or select another language from Change Language and then click Change.
    • Click Run to start the installation immediately.
    • Click Save to copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time.
